zym.tensorflow.tools

类 LabelGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • zym.tensorflow.tools.LabelGenerator

  • public class LabelGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate or parse

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String LABEL_FILE_NAME
      图片标签文件的名称 注意：要和Python文件里一致
      a file with images and assigned labels Note: must be in sync with that in Pthon files
      static java.lang.String LABEL_SEP
      用来读取和打印标签文件、结果文件的分隔符 注意：要和Python文件里一致
      separator used to read and write label files and result files Note: must be in sync with that in Pthon files
      static java.lang.String LABEL_TEXT_FILE_NAME
      标签数字对应文字的文件的名称 注意：要和Python文件里一致
      a file with tha translation of the integers to text labels Note: must be in sync with that in Pthon files
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> labels
      text labels with indices of the corresponding integer labels
      具有相应整数标签索引的文本标签列表
      static java.lang.String SEP
      系统文件路径分隔符
      path separator in the system

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir, java.io.File labelDir)
      creates a label file like:
      path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
      and an int-to-text file like:
      0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

      Assumes that imgs are stored this way: root/catagory1; root/catagory2; root/catagory3; ... no nesting
      acts like LabelGenerator(rootDir, labelDir, 1) but do not call run() afterwards.
      LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir, java.io.File labelDir, int depth)
      creates a label file like:
      path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
      and an int-to-text file like:
      0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

      assumes that imgs are stored this way:
      root/nest1/nest2/xxx.img label for "xxx.img" is then "nest1/nest2"

      must call run() to actually generate the files, before calling run(), this.labels can be manually filled with specific labels and their indices will be used instead of the order read by dir.listFiles()
      创建一个标签文件，如：
      path\to\filename.jpg [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]标签
      和一个int-to-text文件，如：
      0 [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP] 标签1

      假设imgs以这种方式存储：
      根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img 则“xxx.img”的标签是“嵌套1/嵌套2”

      必须调用run()来实际生成文件， 在调用run()之前，this.labels可以手动填充 将使用特定标签及其索引，而不是按dir.listFiles()读取的顺序作为索引
      LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir, java.io.File labelDir, int depth, boolean withSeparateEval)
      creates a label file like:
      path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
      and an int-to-text file like:
      0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

      assumes that imgs are stored this way:
      root/nest1/nest2/xxx.img label for "xxx.img" is then "nest1/nest2"

      must call run() to actually generate the files, before calling run(), this.labels can be manually filled with specific labels and their indices will be used instead of the order read by dir.listFiles()
      创建一个标签文件，如：
      path\to\filename.jpg [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]标签
      和一个int-to-text文件，如：
      0 [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP] 标签1

      假设imgs以这种方式存储：
      根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img 则“xxx.img”的标签是“嵌套1/嵌套2”

      必须调用run()来实际生成文件， 在调用run()之前，this.labels可以手动填充 将使用特定标签及其索引，而不是按dir.listFiles()读取的顺序作为索引

        public static final java.lang.String LABEL_SEP

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LabelGenerator

        public LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir,
                      java.io.File labelDir)
        creates a label file like:
        path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
        and an int-to-text file like:
        0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

        Assumes that imgs are stored this way: root/catagory1; root/catagory2; root/catagory3; ... no nesting
        acts like LabelGenerator(rootDir, labelDir, 1) but do not call run() afterwards. Thus you can't specify the order of the labels

        创建一个标签文件，如：
        path\to\filename.jpg [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]标签
        和一个int-to-text文件，如：
        0 [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP] 标签1

        假设图片以这种方式存储： 根/类别1; 根/类别2; 根/类别3; ...没有嵌套
        像LabelGenerator(rootDir，labelDir，1)的行为， 但不需要在之后调用run()，因此也不能自定义标签顺序
        参数:
        rootDir -
        labelDir - 两个标签文件的存储位置 where you can find the 2 label files

      • LabelGenerator

        public LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir,
                      java.io.File labelDir,
                      int depth)
        creates a label file like:
        path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
        and an int-to-text file like:
        0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

        assumes that imgs are stored this way:
        root/nest1/nest2/xxx.img label for "xxx.img" is then "nest1/nest2"

        must call run() to actually generate the files, before calling run(), this.labels can be manually filled with specific labels and their indices will be used instead of the order read by dir.listFiles()
        创建一个标签文件，如：
        path\to\filename.jpg [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]标签
        和一个int-to-text文件，如：
        0 [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP] 标签1

        假设imgs以这种方式存储：
        根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img 则“xxx.img”的标签是“嵌套1/嵌套2”

        必须调用run()来实际生成文件， 在调用run()之前，this.labels可以手动填充 将使用特定标签及其索引，而不是按dir.listFiles()读取的顺序作为索引
        参数:
        rootDir - 根文件root directory
        labelDir - 两个标签文件的存储位置where you can find the 2 label files
        depth -
        the number of parents an image have to reach the rootDir. For example:
        root/nest1/nest2/xxx.png has depth=2
        If the specified depth = 2, root/nest1/foo.jpg will not appear in the label files.
        图像达到rootDir经过的父文件夹数目。 例如：
        根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img的depth = 2
        如果指定的depth = 2，则根/嵌套1/foo.jpg不会出现在标签文件中。

      • LabelGenerator

        public LabelGenerator(java.io.File rootDir,
                      java.io.File labelDir,
                      int depth,
                      boolean withSeparateEval)
        creates a label file like:
        path\to\filename.jpg[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label
        and an int-to-text file like:
        0[LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]label1

        assumes that imgs are stored this way:
        root/nest1/nest2/xxx.img label for "xxx.img" is then "nest1/nest2"

        must call run() to actually generate the files, before calling run(), this.labels can be manually filled with specific labels and their indices will be used instead of the order read by dir.listFiles()
        创建一个标签文件，如：
        path\to\filename.jpg [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP]标签
        和一个int-to-text文件，如：
        0 [LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP] 标签1

        假设imgs以这种方式存储：
        根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img 则“xxx.img”的标签是“嵌套1/嵌套2”

        必须调用run()来实际生成文件， 在调用run()之前，this.labels可以手动填充 将使用特定标签及其索引，而不是按dir.listFiles()读取的顺序作为索引
        参数:
        rootDir - 根文件root directory
        labelDir - 两个标签文件的存储位置where you can find the 2 label files
        depth -
        the number of parents an image have to reach the rootDir. For example:
        root/nest1/nest2/xxx.png has depth=2
        If the specified depth = 2, root/nest1/foo.jpg will not appear in the label files.
        图像达到rootDir经过的父文件夹数目。 例如：
        根/嵌套1/嵌套2/xxx.img的depth = 2
        如果指定的depth = 2，则根/嵌套1/foo.jpg不会出现在标签文件中。
        withSeparateEval -
        If true, it looks for rootDir/train and rootDir/eval and generate label files in these two folders. The index of the labels are the same.
        如果为true，则查找rootDir/train和rootDir/eval 并在这两个文件夹中生成标签文件。 标签的索引是相同的

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        按照预设生成标签 generate the label files by preset params

      • readLabelsFromFile

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readLabelsFromFile(java.lang.String path)
        参数:
        path - utf-8编码的标签文件的路径path to the label file, utf-8 encoded
        返回:
        an ArrayList of labels read from the label file as separated by LABEL_SEP
        for example "0LABEL_SEPtree" => labels.get(0)==tree
        从标签文件读取由LABEL_SEP分隔的标签到ArrayList
        例如"0LABEL_SEPtree" => labels.get(0)==tree

      • parseResultLine

        public static java.lang.String[] parseResultLine(java.lang.String line,
                                                 int fieldCount)
        Fill the return array with strings split up by LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP
        用LabelGenerator.LABEL_SEP分割字符串，填充返回数组
        参数:
        line - 用于解析的字符串String to be parsed
        fieldCount -
        返回:
        array of length fieldCount. if fieldCount is larger than the actual number of fields in line, the extra parts of the array are null; if fieldCount is less than the actual number of fields, only the first fieldCount fields are returned.
        长度为fieldCount的数组。 如果fieldCount大于line中实际的字段数， 数组的额外部分是null; 如果fieldCount小于实际的字段数， 只返回前fieldCount个字段。

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        样例example
        参数:
        args -
